archetypes.name: Iron Harmony Doctrine
archetypes.description: An ideological framework that perceives the universe as a symphony orchestrated by the balance of metal and consciousness. Believers see harmony in the network of iron veins that sustain their settlements.

visualProperties.proceduralRules: Patterns of interlocking metal veins with woven fabric codex representing philosophical texts.

selectionBias.biasDescription: Dominant in areas with high-metal content providing strategic and spiritual significance.

deconstruction.deconstructionProcess: Decipher philosophical texts to reveal elemental knowledge.

formation.formationProcess: Knowledge pooling from ancient settlers alongside metal-rich landscapes leads to doctrinal synthesis.

synthesisFrom.causalChain: Genesis of knowledge and material intertwining, leading to unified spiritual concepts.

formation.yukaGuidance: Balance must be evaluated in mineral environments with cognitive presence.

archetypes.name: Stone Pattern Allegiance
archetypes.description: An ideology that prioritizes the alignment and organization of stone structures as reflections of cosmic order. These structures serve both religious and social functions in guiding community life.

visualProperties.proceduralRules: Interwoven stone patterns manifested as divine symbols, generally woven with inscriptions using soft fabrics.

selectionBias.biasDescription: Prominent in regions where stone formations offer strategic and cultural prominence.

deconstruction.deconstructionProcess: Analyzing the symbolic patterns to reveal underlying principles.

formation.formationProcess: Formation initiated by cosmic alignment perceived within natural stone formations and organized community structures.

synthesisFrom.causalChain: Result of interpreted natural orders leading to structured meaning.

formation.yukaGuidance: Evaluations needed for cosmic pattern alignment in stone formations.

archetypes.name: Metal Exchange Reverence
archetypes.description: A complex belief system founded on the flow and trade of metals, associating economic activity with spiritual progression. Trade routes become pilgrimages, where metals carry spiritual weight.

visualProperties.proceduralRules: Metallic consistency with interwoven trade patterns represented by softer contrasting textures.

selectionBias.biasDescription: Prevalent near large trade networks involving metal exchanges.

deconstruction.deconstructionProcess: Metal flow traced back to origin to rediscover spiritual channels.

formation.formationProcess: Emerges from complex socioeconomic systems established around metal exchanges and cosmic meaning.

synthesisFrom.causalChain: Proliferation of trade systems leading to spiritual dimensions.

formation.yukaGuidance: Monitor large networks for metal flow direction and spiritual interpretation.
